title: A ‘quite shy’ CEO steps in to lead one of the Philippines’ largest retailers as the country turns a corner on growth
description: Stanley Co, the first CEO from outside the founder's family, is confident that Robinsons Retail can thrive even amid Trump-era uncertainty.
author: Lionel Lim
excerpt: Stanley Co, the first CEO from outside the founder's family, is confident that Robinsons Retail can thrive even amid Trump-era uncertainty.

html:
A ‘quite shy’ CEO steps in to lead one of the Philippines’ largest retailers as the country turns a corner on growth

Stanley Co, 48, took over as CEO of Robinsons Retail Holdings in January and is the first CEO that's not from the founder's family.

Courtesy of Robinsons Retail Holdings
